raw_comment:
• What do you notice?
I notice that a persons legacy and income makes a signifcant difference in college acceptances. 
• What do you wonder?
I wonder why colleges do this because it has nothing to do with one’s academic skills?
• How does this relate to you and your community?
This relates to me and my community because we are applying to colleges. 
• Catchy headline 
Do colleges care about your money or your grades?
ace_sentences: A person's legacy makes a significant difference in college acceptances.
A person's income makes a significant difference in college acceptances.
I wonder why colleges do this.
Legacy has nothing to do with a person's academic skills.
Income has nothing to do with a person's academic skills.
People in my community apply to colleges.
The headline is: Do colleges care about your money or your grades?
